question: Which AWS service is used to create and manage virtual private networks?
description: Amazon VPC allows you to create a virtual network within the AWS cloud.

question: True or False: AWS Lambda can only run Python code.
description: AWS Lambda supports multiple programming languages including Python, Java, Node.js, and more.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that provides a scalable storage solution for backups and archiving.
description: Amazon S3 provides scalable object storage for a variety of data storage needs.

question: What is the primary function of Amazon CloudFront?
description: Amazon CloudFront is a content delivery network (CDN) that accelerates delivery of your static and dynamic web content.

question: Which AWS service can be used to automate the deployment of infrastructure as code?
description: AWS CloudFormation enables you to model and set up your AWS resources so that you can spend less time managing those resources.

question: True or False: Amazon RDS allows for automated backups and point-in-time recovery.
description: Amazon RDS provides automated backups and point-in-time recovery.

question: Which of the following is NOT a valid option for AWS Elastic Beanstalk?
description: Elastic Beanstalk supports web applications and worker environments but does not specifically support a microservices architecture.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is a managed NoSQL database service offered by AWS.
description: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance.

question: Which AWS service provides a way to run code in response to events without provisioning servers?
description: AWS Lambda allows you to run code in response to events without the need to manage servers.

question: True or False: Amazon EBS volumes can be attached to multiple EC2 instances at the same time.
description: Amazon EBS volumes can only be attached to one EC2 instance at a time.

question: What service would you use to monitor AWS resource usage and performance?
description: Amazon CloudWatch provides monitoring for AWS resources and applications in real-time.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ allows you to deploy, manage, and scale applications using containers.
description: Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) allows you to run and manage Docker containers in the cloud.

question: Which service is designed for managing user identities and access permissions in AWS?
description: AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) lets you control access to AWS services and resources.

question: True or False: AWS S3 buckets can be configured to host static websites.
description: You can configure Amazon S3 buckets to host static websites.

question: Which AWS service can help you distribute incoming application traffic across multiple targets?
description: AWS Application Load Balancer automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that allows you to deploy machine learning models.
description: Amazon SageMaker is a fully managed service that allows you to build, train, and deploy machine learning models.

question: What AWS service provides a fully managed database service for relational databases?
description: Amazon RDS provides a fully managed relational database service for various database engines.

question: True or False: Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling adjusts the number of EC2 instances based on demand.
description: Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling automatically adjusts the number of EC2 instances in response to demand.

question: Which service is used to send messages between distributed applications or services?
description: Amazon SQS (Simple Queue Service) is a fully managed message queuing service.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that helps you create and manage a content delivery network.
description: Amazon CloudFront is a content delivery network that delivers your content with low latency.

question: What AWS service provides serverless compute capabilities?
description: AWS Lambda allows you to run code without provisioning or managing servers.

question: True or False: AWS Cost Explorer can help you analyze your AWS spending.
description: AWS Cost Explorer allows you to visualize and analyze your AWS spending patterns.

question: Which AWS service can you use to build and run applications without managing servers?
description: AWS Lambda allows you to run code in response to events without provisioning servers.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that allows for real-time processing of streaming data.
description: Amazon Kinesis enables real-time processing of streaming data at scale.

question: What service provides the ability to run Docker containers on AWS?
description: Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) allows you to run and manage Docker containers in the cloud.

question: True or False: AWS Direct Connect allows you to connect your on-premises data center to AWS directly.
description: AWS Direct Connect provides a dedicated network connection from your premises to AWS.

question: Which AWS service allows you to orchestrate workflows across multiple services?
description: AWS Step Functions makes it easy to coordinate the components of distributed applications.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service for managing and provisioning serverless applications.
description: AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) is a framework for building serverless applications.

question: What is the purpose of Amazon Route 53?
description: Amazon Route 53 is a scalable Domain Name System (DNS) web service for domain registration and DNS routing.

question: True or False: Amazon RDS can automatically scale the database instance based on workload.
description: Amazon RDS does not automatically scale instances; you must manually adjust instance size.

question: Which service allows you to store, manage, and analyze large amounts of data?
description: Amazon Redshift is a fast, fully managed, petabyte-scale data warehouse service.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ provides a managed service for running Kubernetes clusters on AWS.
description: Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) makes it easy to run Kubernetes on AWS.

question: What AWS service allows you to create a dedicated connection between your on-premises infrastructure and AWS?
description: AWS Direct Connect allows you to establish a dedicated network connection to AWS.

question: True or False: AWS Config is used to monitor the configuration of your AWS resources.
description: AWS Config continuously monitors and records AWS resource configurations.

question: Which AWS service is used to store and manage configuration data for applications?
description: AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store is a secure storage for configuration data and secrets.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service used to automate software deployments.
description: AWS CodeDeploy automates the deployment of applications to Amazon EC2 instances and other compute services.

question: Which AWS service provides a way to connect applications to external APIs securely?
description: AWS API Gateway helps you create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs at any scale.

question: True or False: Amazon CloudTrail allows you to monitor and log API calls made in your AWS account.
description: Amazon CloudTrail logs and monitors API calls for your AWS account.

question: What is the main benefit of using AWS CloudFormation?
description: AWS CloudFormation allows you to manage infrastructure as code, enabling automated provisioning.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is a serverless data integration service that enables you to discover, prepare, and combine data.
description: AWS Glue is a fully managed ETL service that makes it easy to prepare and load data for analytics.

question: Which AWS service provides automated threat detection and continuous monitoring?
description: Amazon GuardDuty is a threat detection service that continuously monitors for malicious activity.

question: True or False: AWS Global Accelerator improves the availability and performance of your applications by directing traffic to optimal endpoints.
description: AWS Global Accelerator improves availability and performance by directing user traffic to the best endpoints.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the service that allows for centralized management of multiple AWS accounts.
description: AWS Organizations helps you manage billing and access to AWS resources across multiple accounts.

question: Which service can help you detect and respond to security incidents on AWS?
description: Amazon GuardDuty is a security monitoring service that helps detect suspicious activity.

question: True or False: AWS Shield provides protection against Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks.
description: AWS Shield provides DDoS protection for applications running on AWS.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that simplifies the process of deploying and managing applications in Docker containers.
description: Amazon ECS simplifies running and managing Docker containers on AWS.

question: Which service allows for real-time monitoring and visualization of AWS resources and application performance?
description: Amazon CloudWatch monitors AWS resources and applications, providing real-time insights.

question: True or False: AWS Lambda can be invoked directly by an Amazon S3 event.
description: AWS Lambda can be triggered by events from Amazon S3, such as object uploads.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that enables serverless application deployment.
description: AWS Lambda allows you to run code without provisioning servers.

question: What AWS service allows for automated machine learning model deployment?
description: Amazon SageMaker provides a fully managed service for building, training, and deploying machine learning models.

question: True or False: Amazon S3 is used for storing structured database data.
description: Amazon S3 is an object storage service primarily used for unstructured data.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that helps you create and manage APIs.
description: Amazon API Gateway allows you to create, publish, and manage APIs at scale.

question: Which service helps with orchestration of microservices architectures?
description: AWS Step Functions orchestrates microservices into serverless workflows.

question: True or False: AWS Well-Architected Tool helps in assessing the architecture of your application.
description: The AWS Well-Architected Tool allows you to review and improve your architecture based on AWS best practices.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that simplifies the ETL process.
description: AWS Glue is a fully managed ETL service that simplifies the process of moving and transforming data.

question: What AWS service provides a managed environment for deploying and running applications?
description: AWS Elastic Beanstalk allows developers to deploy and manage applications without worrying about the infrastructure.

question: True or False: Amazon DynamoDB is a NoSQL database service.
description: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that allows you to run code in response to events without provisioning servers.
description: AWS Lambda lets you run code in response to events without managing servers.

question: What AWS service provides a unified interface for managing access to AWS resources?
description: AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) helps you securely control access to AWS services and resources.

question: True or False: AWS Trusted Advisor provides recommendations for best practices related to your AWS account.
description: AWS Trusted Advisor provides recommendations to help you follow AWS best practices.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service used for visualizing and analyzing data in real-time.
description: Amazon Kinesis is used for real-time data processing and analytics.

question: Which service can help you automate the provisioning and management of AWS resources?
description: AWS CloudFormation provides a common language for describing and provisioning AWS infrastructure.

question: True or False: AWS Secrets Manager helps you manage and retrieve secrets securely.
description: AWS Secrets Manager protects access to your applications, services, and IT resources without the upfront investment.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that provides a fully managed, serverless compute service.
description: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs code in response to events.

question: Which AWS service enables you to migrate databases to AWS easily?
description: AWS Database Migration Service helps you migrate databases to AWS easily and securely.

question: True or False: Amazon S3 supports versioning of objects.
description: Amazon S3 supports versioning, allowing you to keep multiple versions of an object in the same bucket.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the service used for creating, managing, and deploying containers on AWS.
description: Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) enables you to run and manage Docker containers.

question: What AWS service provides a high-performance file system for use with AWS Cloud services?
description: Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) provides a scalable and fully managed file storage solution.

question: True or False: AWS CodePipeline automates the build, test, and deployment phases of your release process.
description: AWS CodePipeline is a continuous delivery service for fast and reliable application updates.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that provides real-time insights into resource utilization.
description: Amazon CloudWatch monitors AWS resources and applications in real-time.

question: Which AWS service allows you to automate security assessments of applications deployed on AWS?
description: AWS Inspector is an automated security assessment service to help improve the security and compliance of applications.

question: True or False: AWS WAF protects your web applications from common web exploits.
description: AWS WAF is a web application firewall that protects applications from common web exploits.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that helps in building, training, and deploying machine learning models.
description: Amazon SageMaker provides tools to build, train, and deploy machine learning models at scale.

question: Which AWS service allows you to create, manage, and deploy applications using serverless architecture?
description: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs code in response to events.

question: True or False: Amazon CloudFront is a content delivery network (CDN) that speeds up the distribution of your static and dynamic web content.
description: Amazon CloudFront is a CDN that accelerates the delivery of your content to users worldwide.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service used to manage and provision resources in an automated way.
description: AWS CloudFormation allows you to create and manage AWS resources through templates.

question: What AWS service provides a fully managed, scalable, and secure NoSQL database?
description: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database that provides fast and predictable performance.

question: True or False: AWS Cost Explorer helps you visualize your spending and usage on AWS.
description: AWS Cost Explorer helps you analyze your spending patterns and visualize your AWS costs.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that enables you to set up a virtual private cloud.
description: AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) allows you to provision a logically isolated section of the AWS cloud.

question: Which AWS service provides a managed solution for container orchestration?
description: Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) is a managed service for running Kubernetes on AWS.

question: True or False: AWS Data Pipeline allows you to automate data movement and transformation.
description: AWS Data Pipeline is a web service that helps you process and move data between different AWS services.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that allows you to deploy machine learning models easily.
description: Amazon SageMaker provides a complete set of tools for building, training, and deploying machine learning models.

question: What AWS service is used for secure and scalable file storage?
description: Amazon S3 provides object storage through a simple web service interface.

question: True or False: AWS Elastic Beanstalk automatically handles the deployment, from capacity provisioning to load balancing.
description: AWS Elastic Beanstalk automates deployment, allowing you to focus on your application code.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service used for monitoring and logging AWS resources and applications.
description: AWS CloudTrail enables governance, compliance, and operational and risk auditing of your AWS account.

question: Which AWS service helps you secure your AWS resources by allowing you to create security policies?
description: AWS IAM lets you manage access to AWS services and resources securely.

question: True or False: AWS Config enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.
description: AWS Config provides AWS resource configuration history to help you evaluate compliance.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that allows you to deploy applications with the help of Docker containers.
description: Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) is a fully managed container orchestration service.

question: What AWS service provides a scalable and fully managed database service for PostgreSQL and MySQL?
description: Amazon RDS makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale relational databases in the cloud.

question: True or False: AWS Shield provides DDoS protection for applications running on AWS.
description: AWS Shield provides protection against DDoS attacks for your applications.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that allows you to build, train, and deploy machine learning models at scale.
description: Amazon SageMaker provides a fully managed service to build, train, and deploy machine learning models.

question: Which AWS service allows you to manage your AWS resources using a simple and unified interface?
description: The AWS Management Console provides a web-based interface for managing AWS resources.

question: True or False: AWS Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets.
description: AWS Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service used to create, manage, and deploy APIs.
description: Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service for creating, publishing, maintaining, monitoring, and securing APIs.

question: What AWS service is used for building applications that require serverless event-driven computing?
description: AWS Lambda allows you to run code in response to events without provisioning servers.

question: True or False: AWS X-Ray helps developers analyze and debug production applications.
description: AWS X-Ray helps developers analyze and debug production applications to understand their performance.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that provides scalable object storage with built-in security and access management.
description: Amazon S3 provides scalable object storage with integrated security and access controls.

question: Which AWS service provides managed resources for big data processing?
description: Amazon EMR is a cloud-native big data platform for processing large amounts of data using popular open-source tools.

question: True or False: Amazon RDS provides a managed relational database service that is compatible with several database engines.
description: Amazon RDS supports multiple database engines, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that helps you monitor and log your AWS cloud resources and applications.
description: Amazon CloudWatch provides monitoring and logging for AWS resources and applications.

question: What AWS service allows you to deploy applications in containers without managing servers?
description: AWS Fargate allows you to run containers without managing the underlying infrastructure.

question: True or False: AWS Organizations helps you centrally manage multiple AWS accounts.
description: AWS Organizations lets you create and manage multiple AWS accounts centrally.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that provides a scalable way to run containers without managing the infrastructure.
description: AWS Fargate enables you to run containers without managing the underlying infrastructure.

question: What AWS service is used for resource provisioning and configuration management?
description: AWS CloudFormation allows you to model and provision AWS resources using a declarative template.

question: True or False: Amazon Aurora is a MySQL and PostgreSQL-compatible relational database built for the cloud.
description: Amazon Aurora is designed for high performance and availability, compatible with MySQL and PostgreSQL.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is an AWS service that automates code deployments to various services.
description: AWS CodeDeploy automates the deployment of applications to various AWS services.

question: Which AWS service provides a secure and scalable way to transfer files over the internet?
description: AWS Transfer Family provides secure file transfer over SFTP, FTPS, and FTP directly into and out of Amazon S3.

question: True or False: AWS Snowball is a service that helps move large amounts of data into and out of AWS.
description: AWS Snowball is a data transport solution to transfer large amounts of data into and out of AWS.

question: Fill in the blank: _________ is the AWS service that enables serverless real-time processing of data streams.
description: Amazon Kinesis enables real-time processing of streaming data at scale.
